summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of the alley in Block 46, Capitol Hill Division No. 6 Addition, being the alley between 19th Avenue North and 20th Avenue North, from East Aloha Street to East Roy Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Majority Petition No. 89135, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
